name: VIDANGEL
description: VidAngel is an entertainment platform empowering users to filter content from movies/films
sampleDescriptions: Updates to the Family Movie Act. Child Safe Viewing Act.
Updates to the Family Movie Act.
Updates to the Family Movie Act (H.R. 6816) sponsored by Rep. Mia Love to allow parents and individuals to filter streamed content that they find objectionable.

proposed legislation to update the Family Movie Act of 2005.
